attributes.action: Ban all racist political leaders into the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: He dose not care about women's rights he is racist
attributes.background: Leaders like trump shouldn't be allowed entry

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure which leaders you would like to be banned from entering the UK.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
